Applied Epidemiology in One Health Research YNguyn Thanh Lng 2020-12-01 Chapter 1 Li nói u This is a sample book written in Markdown. You can use anything that Pandocs Markdown supports, e.g., a math equation . The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") a <- b + c Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.org/tinytex/.
